Supplmental Material

Are transcripts useful?

Transcripts help users understand what was said and find material in the video

Timestamps

Ease video navigation

Code Samples

Code samples keep the user from typing in text seen in the video. Reduces stop/pause.

Comments

Others asking about video

Supplemental Text

Videos are sometimes surrounded by text explaining what is in the video.
